item.title: What is progress?
item.description: What is progress? Am I improving? Where do I go? Some of our greatest minds lost their ways in the process of self-realization, stuck in a place where they have to constantly prove that they are worthy enough thus earning a right to exist. The endless search for approval could work as a barrier in their path. (isnâ€™t it like licking your wound to heal it, but your tongue is too rough and ripping the surface again?
